basic.description: This course will introduce major themes and concepts in the cultures of a specific nation with an emphasis on understanding and examining the important social, historical and cultural contexts of the country and its people.  Topics may include art, film, economy, religion, and politics.  The specific 'Nation' details to be announced on the Languages, Literatures and Cultures website.
basic.subject: LLCU
basic.title: The Cultures of a Nation
